title: Interpretation of seeing songs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of watching songs through a website: Seeing songs are poetic texts played on instruments intended to give them a kind of music to the listener’s ear. Types of songs vary depending on societies, languages, and tastes over the years. Seeing listening to songs in a dreamThere are many clues and interpretations. Through this article, we will explain the most important things that the great dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen have brought to different people, such as single, married, and pregnant women, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing songs in a dream: Seeing someone listening to songs at home is an indication of his feeling of depression and the need to accompany him in his affairs. Listening to songs in holy places such as the mosque is an indication of immorality, deviation from the truth, and stupidity. Seeing myself listening to songs at work indicates that the fortuneteller does not like his work and wants to change it. Seeing him refusing to listen to songs in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s piety and closeness to his Lord. Seeing a guardian preventing him from listening To songs indicates that for those who are responsible, this is an indication that he is a responsible person and manages his life correctly. Singing in a dream indicates trade and profits in the case of singing with one voice. Seeing singing in a dream with a bad voice indicates material and commercial losses. See also: Interpretation of seeing the presence of fara in Dream Interpretation of seeing songs in a dream Ibn Sirin says that he sees songs in a dream If the dreamer is a property owner and the rich person is affected by poverty and loss. Seeing listening to songs in a dream with a beautiful voice, can be a sign of the fortuneteller’s profits. Singing in the bathroom in a dream Hint of gossip from behind. Dreaming of hearing songs indicates that there are disagreements and conflicts between individuals. Ibn Sirin narrates that a singer in a dream is a person with knowledge and knowledge or a sovereign. If someone sings with a terrible voice, in the dream, it is a sign of losing important things, financially or professionally. See also: Interpretation Seeing a wedding party in a dream. Interpretation of seeing songs in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a girl singing with a musical instrument is an indication that she is seducing people around her. Seeing a girl means that she is singing to herself with a voice in a dream. It is a sign of happiness that she will have soon. The girl’s refusal to listen to songs in a dream indicates her piety and separation. About suspicion. Seeing a girl indicates that she is singing about her family. If her voice is single, this is a sign that she is a source of happiness and joy for her family. What if she sings with a bad voice? It is a sign that he is causing fatigue and turmoil to his people. Seeing a lonely girl someone is singing to her in a dream is an indication that A healthy young man will propose to her soon. Interpretation of seeing songs in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman singing to her husband is an example of understanding and love between them and their stable life. Seeing her singing with a beautiful voice in a dream indicates that the woman is married. In weddings comes happiness and good news. Watching songs indicates words that are not allowed In a married woman's dream, for problems and disputes in the home

title: Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream according to the great interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream The bat or bat is considered one of the most terrifying animals for humans in general. If he sees it in a dream, he feels anxious and very afraid of the meaning of this vision and seeks to interpret it, whether he sees himself killing the bat. Or if the bat was in his home or saw a group of bats. Today and until today, different, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream, what are its interpretations, and what is the interpretation of this dream for the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream according to dream interpretation scholars: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a bat in a dream as a righteous person attached to his religion and worship, performing prayers and abstaining from the pleasures of worldly life. As for the scholar Ibn Shaheen, he interpreted the bat in a dream as a sign of fear and terror, and it can also indicate oppression and injustice, and God knows best. As for Al-Nabulsi, he interprets seeing a bat in a dream as a sign of safety and lack of fear, and it may indicate news of pregnancy or childbirth, and it may indicate fear, and that the dreamer is far from his religion and may be offers of a long life for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams of a bat in a dream, this indicates her fear and distance from her religious matters. He also interpreted seeing a bat in a dream as evidence of feeling stable and safe after his fear of the girl who is dreaming. Also, seeing a bat in a dream An unmarried girl indicates that the girl who dreams is warned against the deception of enemies and warned against falling into harm. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she sees a bat in a dream, this is good news, and God knows best. Seeing a bat in a married woman’s dream means pregnancy soon. Also, seeing a bat in a dream can be a description of a woman who dreams that she is corrupt and deals in magic. Bats in a dream are an unhealthy woman who tries to harm people with magic and sorcery. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a pregnant woman: After presenting the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a single girl and a married woman, we will now find out what is the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a bat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her due date is approaching, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman dreams that she sees a sleeping bat in a dream, this indicates the longevity of that dreamer. Also, seeing a bat in a dream indicates that the sex of the fetus is male, and God knows best. Seeing a bat in a dream indicates the intelligence of the pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing A black bat in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy in this woman’s area who is trying to harm her, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a man: If a man dreams that he sees a bat in a dream, this indicates that he is a hypocritical person who shows the opposite of what he hides in his heart and that he deceives those around him. Seeing a bat in a man’s dream also indicates his longevity. The dream of a bat in a man’s dream can be interpreted as a pious person who is attached to his religion and prayers and performs many good deeds. As for Al-Nabulsi alone, he interpreted seeing a bat in a dream as a sign of stability and

title: Interpretation of apple cider vinegar in a dream and drinking apple cider vinegar in a dream

preview.html: Seeing vinegar for a single woman A pregnant woman buys a white bottle and bathing with vinegar poured on food for Ibn Sirin and more Apple cider vinegar has many positive connotations, as it has been considered for thousands of years a very effective medical method for treating many diseases and is characterized by great therapeutic abilities, so it is considered a sign of goodness and health. Whoever eats vinegar with bread in a dream means that he will get money and live a decent life. If the wife sees in her dream that she is eating bread with vinegar, this means that she will take a high position with her husband as long as she drinks vinegar. The prisoner who sees himself drinking vinegar in his dream means that he will soon obtain freedom and relieve his worries. If the vinegar in the dream is pure, original and free of impurities, this means that you will receive many blessings without fatigue and hardship. If it contains the same impurities, it means fatigue, trouble and slipping to get money or achieve something. A pregnant woman who drinks apple cider vinegar in a dream means that she will soon bid farewell and grieve the death of someone close to her before the birth of her child. A wife who drinks vinegar in a dream without eating it with food means that she may separate from her husband, and she will take a very low position and will live a period of sadness and fatigue. Whoever sees himself drinking vinegar, this means that he will get sick according to the amount he drank in the dream, or that he will soon hear bad news. Whoever sees himself putting vinegar in a dining room surrounded by many people means that he suffers from many problems with people. A girl who sees herself drinking vinegar in a dream means that she will marry a man who will be the cause of her pain in the future Astrologer Ahmed Shaheen explains the interpretation of seeing oil and vinegar in a dream - YouTube Interpretation of vinegar, milk, water, oil, honey, dates, juice and lemon

title: Seeing the funeral of someone who has already died in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the funeral of someone who has already died in a dream accumulates for the person in his real life, and there are many events that will happen to him, including positive ones, according to the details. Let us now know what the commentators brought from the interpretation of the funeral of an already dead person in a dream through the site. Different general interpretation: Seeing the funeral of an already dead person in a dream. This dream suggests that the dreamer’s life is not going well and there is a reason for him to adopt some negative thoughts that make him deviate from the right path. And he does not reach the desired goal. If this person is his father, then he may in fact be a transgressor of his rights, and his father died while he was dissatisfied with him, which requires him to constantly seek forgiveness and pay zakat for his father’s soul until he is satisfied and nourished. . His condition before his Lord. Some interpretive scholars state that the dream indicates that he is exposed to a financial crisis, especially if he is a merchant and has a project or deals, so he must be careful and prepare to bear losses. But if she is an unmarried girl and sees this dream, unfortunately, she will live in an unbalanced psychological state due to her failure to Her emotional life and her failure to establish social relationships with others. Interpretation of the funeral of an already dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing death again is a sign of the evil that the dreamer is going through in his life and that he is facing many difficulties that he does not have the energy or ability to confront. Seeing someone wandering around Carrying the coffin of a person known to be dead, it was interpreted as an attempt to provide services to the family of that deceased or to marry their daughters in the future. If he is a student of knowledge, things are difficult in his studies and he is unable to catch up with his colleagues, which makes him feel a failure and disappointment, and the matter is easy for him only to ask for forgiveness and dhikr until May God provide. It has strength and energy. Interpretation of seeing the funeral of someone who has already died in a dream for a single woman: If she has planned some ambitions in terms of study or work, there are some obstacles that appear before her that do not make things go as planned, and if she feels hopeless in the first round, she may withdraw from her goal. The spirit of hope and optimism. In the event that a girl gets engaged, there are problems between her and her fiancé, and she is thinking about staying away from him due to the lack of comfort and lack of equality in thinking between them. In any case, separating now is much better than waiting until then. Marriage happens and he discovers that there is no understanding between them. But if she is studying, she is struggling in some subjects and she is not optimistic about taking the test now, but she needs to be more focused. Interpretation of seeing the funeral of someone who has already died in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a dead person buried again is a sign of problems That she is going through with her husband, and this difficult time must be dealt with calmly so as not to lose her security and stability with her husband and children. If she is found crying at the funeral, then she repents of a great sin she committed, repents of it, and turns to her Lord. If the deceased was the husband, then she is still suffering. He is deeply saddened by his separation, and at the same time she does not find in herself the ability to bear these new burdens that are added to her after his death. He hit her on the cheek behind the funeral as a bad omen that haunts him.

title: Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream and peace by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, everything mentioned in the interpretation of seeing the king in a dream, peace and blessings be upon him, in various cases, their meanings and symbols. Dreams are a vast sea that includes many interpretations and meanings that the dreamer quickly uses in reality to see the most prominent of these interpretations and search for the signs that they carry. However, they can be Dreams or simple details related to your day and situations that turn into visions and dreams, and many people can use dreams to learn about the meanings and symbols that seeing a kissing hand carries in the eyes of the king. A dream, so what about the interpretations of seeing the king sick or dead in a dream, according to what was said about Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi? We take you on a tour to present the interpretations contained in seeing the king in a dream in an encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream, peace and blessings be upon him. Various interpretations of seeing the king in a dream and a conversation with him, may God bless him and grant him peace. May God bless him and grant him peace, and this is what we are talking about. Especially since seeing the king puts the dreamer in a state of happiness in the hope that her dreams will bring good news. What about seeing a king in a dream and the meanings it carries? We decode this through the following lines: Seeing the king in a dream and peace be upon him is interpreted as: May God have mercy on him, achieving all his desires and goals that he aspires to, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing yourself shaking hands with the king and greeting him in a dream symbolizes. Ascending to the highest positions and achieving what He desires, God willing, and God knows best. Seeing the king in a dream and peace with him in the dreamer’s dream means that; The travel, entertainment and life that the dreamer desires is always achieved by God’s command, and the Lord is the Most High and most knowledgeable. Seeing the king in a dream indicates the goodness that flows to the dreamer in reality, especially since seeing the king indicates a number of meanings and connotations that we explain in the following points: It states: The extraordinary work done by the dreamer. Promotion and taking seats. Traveling and flying in the sky is what the viewer actually desires. Seeing the king kissing and greeting him symbolizes him. The dreamer's high position in reality among the members of his or her family, as he rises in status to become the head of the family, manages its affairs and becomes the main reference for them in their special circumstances, so he feels comfortable. He is fulfilling his dream of becoming the head of his family, and God knows best. A dream about kissing and hugging the dreamer means that; May God grant him success in traveling to the destination he has always chosen, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a king in a dream and bowing to him is not one of the good visions that bode well, as bowing indicates the difficulties that the dreamer faces in reality, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a dead king in a dream What are the interpretations contained in the vision? A dead king in a dream? “, as seeing the dead in a dream is one of the heartbreaking visions that cause anxiety, tension, and negative feelings that the viewer experiences in reality. Seeing a dead king in a dream leads to a number of interpretations that we explain below: Some believe that seeing the king dying in a dream is one of the visions. Which leads to evil, but in reality it refers to; Everyone who has a right acquires his right

preview.html: Which leads to a feeling of fear when he wakes up, and in this article from gptafser.com/ we will learn about all of this from the opinions of interpreters and religious scholars. Interpretation of seeing fear in dreams about a single girl. The interpretation of fear in a dream for a single girl varies depending on the circumstances of her life. Since the girl is unmarried. A married woman sees that she is afraid in her dream, this means that she has great confidence in herself. There is also another interpretation that says that if a beautiful girl sees that she is afraid of someone in a dream. This means that she is afraid of someone who desires her and her beauty and that there is someone chasing her unknown. Interpretation scholars said this Fear in the dream of an unmarried girl. This means that there is good news on her way soon, and there may be a lot of money or her marriage soon. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is afraid of her studies and cries a lot. It means that she will succeed and succeed in her studies and get the highest Degrees. See also: Interpretation of seeing fear in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Follow the interpretation of dreams about a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is afraid of her husband in a dream, this means her intense love for him and her excessive fear of him. A married woman sees in her dream that she is afraid and cries from her fear. It means that her life will be Calm and reassured, and she will be stable with her husband and her marriage will be happy. Watching a married woman get scared in her sleep and cry and rain heavily in her sleep. The meaning of the dream was that she would have great acceptance for her, and she would have a lot of money, and if she did not give birth, she would have good offspring. A married woman saw She is afraid and cries a lot due to lack of livelihood and hardship in the dream. This means that he will get a lot of money and a great source of livelihood. A married woman sees that his wife is poor and is afraid for him and cries. This means that her husband will get a lot of money and that his family will have a lot of sustenance. Interpretation of seeing fear in a man’s dreams and its meaning: If a person dreams that he is afraid of snakes or snakes, this means that he will conquer his enemies and achieve overwhelming success. A person’s fear of animals in a dream means that there is a fateful matter or event that will happen in his life. To see a man in a dream is that He is afraid of a woman he loves in reality, it means that his love for her is great and he has strong feelings towards her. A man seeing that he is afraid of a police officer or a high-ranking person. This means that he will reach a high position and will have power and prestige. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of hitting the dead in a dream

preview.html: Overcoming the dead in a dream This dream is one of the dreams that causes the viewer a lot of anxiety and fear and carries many connotations and interpretations, including good, warning him against evil, and urging him to stop committing sins, and this vision varies according to his psychological and social state. And also whether that person he saw in the dream was actually dead or not. Beating the dead in a dream. What is the interpretation of beating the dead in a dream? The interpretation of the dream of beating the dead in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer has committed many sins or will commit them in reality. If If he sees himself in a dream that he is hitting a dead man on the head with a stick, this indicates his strong need to change his job or boss. If the dreamer is possessed by witchcraft and sees that he is hitting a dead person, this is a sign that he will get rid of this witchcraft and damage as quickly as possible. Hitting a dead person in a dream According to Ibn Sirin, dreaming of beating a deceased person in a dream symbolizes that the deceased enjoyed a high status in the dreamer’s life or the existence of a relationship or partnership between them. If someone he does not know sees a dead person and beats him, this is evidence of his marriage to a relative of the deceased. If one sees that his father has died and beats him in... Dreaming, this indicates the abundance of goodness and abundance of livelihood after hardship and exhaustion. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Beating the dead in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of this dream in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her short marriage and symbolizes that she is going through a difficult period, but it will be Able to overcome it as soon as possible. If she dreams of a dead person slapping her in the face, this is a sign that she will enter into an emotional relationship that will fail and cause many problems. The interpretation of beating a woman to death symbolizes gaining abundant money, but through suspicious and illegal means. Beating The dead in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of beating the dead in a dream for a married woman means that she is committing many sins and transgressions and she must beware and stop these actions and repent and return to God. If a married woman sees her father beating her in a dream, this indicates her caution and the necessity of preserving the secrets of her home, her husband and her father. If She dreamed that her father had died in the dream and abused her, then this is a sign of the many disputes between her and her husband, but they will end and life will return to normal again. If she sees that her husband has died and she beats him, then this is evidence that she inherited, and an indication that the door to livelihood and abundance of goodness will be opened. Beating the dead in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that a dead person is beating her in a dream, this indicates the necessity of looking at her life and correcting her mistakes so that the losses do not increase, and it indicates that God will bless her with a male child. If she sees that her dead father is beating her, this is evidence that she will be exposed to a health problem during Pregnancy until birth, but she and her fetus will be healthy. The most important interpretations of beating dead people in a dream. A dead father beating his daughter in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a dead father beating his unmarried daughter in a dream shows his intense anger at her and warns her of the wrong things and actions that she commits and causes her to suffer.

title: Interpretation of seeing a slave girl in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: If he is white or black, if he is beautiful or ugly, and in this article we will show you all the possible interpretations about seeing a slave in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a slave girl by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a slave girl in a dream that seeing a slave girl in a dream means spreading unrest and may indicate goodness that It will befall the dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream a slave with whom he has intercourse or marries in a dream, this dream indicates the return of the absent person. A topical dream and its interpretation. Seeing a maid in a dream indicates something that happened in the past or indicates new things in the future life. Seeing a maid in a dream means that you will receive... Soon there will be news that may be pleasant or news that may not please the dreamer, and this depends on the degree of beauty of the maid in the dream. And to see today naked and exposed in the dream, indicates news that has been widely circulated and is no longer important or well-known news. As you can see, being implemented in the dream indicates news A secret that is not yet known. As for seeing a maid wearing a niqab in a dream, this indicates news tinged with doubts and suspicion. Interpretation of buying a slave girl in a dream. Scholars interpreted buying a slave girl in a dream and getting her or receiving her as a gift from someone, and this dream indicates the exchange of goods or money. Whoever sees In the dream, he accepts or intends to buy the current. This dream indicates the dreamer’s intention to enter the field of trade. Interpretation of seeing a Muslim slave girl in a dream: Whoever sees a Muslim slave in a dream, this dream is a sign of good and unexpected news for the dreamer. A beautiful maid in a dream indicates receiving... Happy news that delights the dreamer’s heart. Seeing a slave girl in a dream and its various interpretations. Anyone who dreams of a girl with a frowning or ugly face, then this dream indicates bad news that the dreamer will receive. A lazy maid in a dream is a sign that she is going through a stage of distress and delusion. And whoever sees in a dream that he is looking To a slave without bare clothes, then this dream is a sign of serious loss in his trade, and harm to the dreamer. And whoever sees in his dream that he has a slave girl, then this dream is a sign of profit from his trade. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing a slave in a dream. That is, Someone has a vision and wants to interpret it, we receive your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Clues and meanings related to the interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a pregnant woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a boy giving birth to a non-pregnant woman? It means a great fortune that you can collect in a short period of time. The meaning of seeing a virgin and her fetus dying? It means her marriage to a young man with a bad personality and biography. What is the interpretation of seeing a girl giving birth in a dream? It means alleviating problems, especially for For a married woman. The meaning of seeing a male giving birth? It indicates narrow livelihood, debts, and worries. What is the interpretation of seeing a man giving birth to a married woman who was not pregnant? I mean anxiety and sadness that was still young. Interpretation of seeing a birth. Interpretation of dreams for a male giving birth to someone who is not pregnant, means wealth A large number that you can collect in a short period of time. If a pregnant woman dreams that she gave birth to a boy, then her child is a female and vice versa. If she is not pregnant, if she sees that she gave birth to a girl, and she is nervous and depressed, her condition will change to joy. A dream about the birth of a man for a married woman who is not pregnant, It means worry and sadness if he is still young, holding his hand. Seeing a dream about an unmarried woman giving birth. Interpretation of seeing a virgin birth, and the death of her fetus, means her marriage to a young man of bad character and biography. If a girl gives birth to a weak and weak child, this means that she will marry a man who will cause her problems and troubles Dreaming of giving birth and giving birth to a child with the body of a cat means that her money and possessions will be stolen. Seeing childbirth in a dream for a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin said that the gender of the newborn in a dream comes to reality, the opposite of what he saw. However, some commentators disagreed about whether what you saw is a real vision. One of the conditions of the dream is that You perform ablution and wake up from your dream at the time of dawn or dawn. Therefore, if a pregnant woman dreams that she has given birth to a girl, then she is a woman, because the dream came true as it is without change. A dream about the death of your child, according to Ibn Sirin, is that a woman who sees in a dream is giving birth to a dead or weak child, and this means That her fetus will be the cause of the physical pain that she will feel after giving birth, or the psychological problems that she will face later. But if the child is beautiful and fat, this means ease of birth and ease of life, especially if her child is a female and not a male. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl: A dream about giving birth to a girl means alleviating Problems, especially for married women. The birth of a girl means freedom from debts and financial problems. If the dreamer is sick, the interpretation of childbirth here means the approaching term. Childbirth means farewell to sorrows, and the beginning of a new life in the family environment. The birth of a girl in a dream for a merchant or employer It means the success of the project and the start of a fruitful investment soon. The birth of a girl, and the married woman was not pregnant, means shocking and unexpected events. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a boy. A boy’s dream means a major problem or disaster. The birth of a boy means the death of the fetus for the pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing a male giving birth indicates a lack of livelihood. And debts and worries. He was praised for seeing the big boy, because he feels relieved and happy news you will get. Joy in a dream. Seeing grilled fish. Shrimps in a dream. Lentils in a dream. Seeing raw fish. Suicide in a dream. Vomiting in

title: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and fear

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Resurrection Day and fear: Seeing Resurrection Day in a dream is one of the dreams that causes panic and fear to the dreamer, especially since on this day we will all be exposed.Different Interpretation of a dream about Resurrection Day and fear Interpretation of a dream about Resurrection Day and fear Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees Resurrection Day in a dream and feels fear in the dream, then this It indicates that there are many fears in the life of the dreamer regarding some matters in his life. Imam Al-Sadiq says that feeling fear of the Day of Resurrection in a dream indicates the dreamer’s distance from God Almighty and from performing acts of worship and prayer, and he must reconsider his actions. Fear of the Day of Resurrection in The dream may indicate that the dreamer will fall into a major problem in his life in the coming period, from which it will be difficult to get out. Al-Nabulsi also says that the fear of the Day of Resurrection in the dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many crises and debts in the coming period of his life. Interpretation of the vision Day of Resurrection in a dream. Many dream interpreters confirm that the appearance of the Day of Resurrection in an oppressor’s dream is a warning sign for that person to stop the injustice he is committing, because he will stand up on this great day and answer for his actions. In the event that the dreamer is exposed to injustice and wrongdoing at this time, then seeing him on this great day Resurrection in a dream foretells the imminent emergence of the truth as quickly as possible and the support of a dreamer. On the Day of Resurrection in a dream, without feeling fear, it can indicate the stability that the dreamer feels in his life at this time. Interpretation of a dream about Resurrection Day and the fear of a married womanIf a woman sees A married woman in a dream on the Day of Resurrection and afraid of this day, this indicates that this woman will fall into major problems with her husband at this time, which may lead to divorce. The Day of Resurrection and fear of it in the dream may indicate that this woman is exposed to multiple psychological pressures that this woman is experiencing. Currently in her life. If the dreamer is pregnant, then the appearance of the Day of Resurrection in the dream indicates that this woman’s situation is approaching in the near future, God willing. If the married woman is going through an experience at this time, then the appearance of the Day of Resurrection in the dream indicates that relief is approaching. This experience and salvation from it. Al-Saidi says that a sick woman who suffers from a serious illness, and the appearance of the Day of Resurrection in her dream may be a harbinger of that woman’s imminent death. Interpretation of dreams on the Day of Resurrection and fear for pregnant women. Imam Al-Saidi says that a woman’s renunciation of sins and disobedience in life can make her see The Day of Resurrection in her dream, and this is a good omen for her repentance from those sins and transgressions in reality. If this lady mistreats her husband, then the appearance of the Day of Resurrection in the dream may be a warning to improve her treatment of the husband, because this may make her commit many sins without realizing it. If she sees that her deeds are on the scale of the Day of Resurrection and that the good deeds outweigh the bad deeds, then this is good news that this lady is a righteous woman who fears God in the deeds that she performs in her life. Interpretation of a dream on the Day of ResurrectionInterpretation of a dream on the Day of Resurrection and Fear Some interpreters of the dream believe
